name: MSG91
description:
MSG91 offers a WhatsApp Business API solution that helps businesses improve customer communication and streamline interactions. This API allows companies to integrate WhatsApp messaging into their systems, enabling notifications, two-way conversations, and automation of customer support.

Key Features:
WhatsApp Catalogue – Display products and services within WhatsApp, allowing customers to browse and inquire seamlessly.
Broadcast & Campaign Messaging – Send bulk messages for updates, promotions, and personalized marketing campaigns.
Interactive Messaging – Engage customers with interactive buttons and lists for better communication.
Analytics & Reporting – Access detailed insights into business messages, track performance, and export logs for records.

MSG91 simplifies the process of setting up a WhatsApp Business account with Meta and activating a business number. For pricing and integration details, businesses can reach out to their support team.
focus_areas: Seamless Integrations – Connect effortlessly with platforms like Freshworks, WebEngage, MoEngage, CleverTap, Shopify, Wix, Google Sheet
Zero Charge on Click-to-WhatsApp Ads – Utilize Click-to-WhatsApp Ads without extra session charges, ensuring cost-effective communication.
WhatsApp ChatBot – Automate customer interactions with pre-set responses for handling common queries, order tracking, and support.
